sentences:
al - Burj ( ) , also spelled Borj , is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate , northwestern Syria .
Situated in the northern Aqil mountains , bordering the Queiq Plain to the west , it is located between al - Rai and al - Bab , some northeast of the city of Aleppo , and south of the border to the Turkish province of Kilis .
Al Burj was captured by Turkish - backed Free Syrian Army from ISIS , On 7 November 2016 .
Administratively the village belongs to Nahiya al - Bab in al - Bab District .
Nearby localities include Tall Battal to the south , and Ka'ibah to the northwest , on the Queiq Plain .
In the 2004 census , al - Burj had a population of 236 .
